2069350.name: Dark Mist
2069350.description:
Alan is a young knight apprentice descended from the guardian clan of Nardin, Nardin is a peaceful city,
that is invaded by cruel ones that cause fear and panic to the local citizens. Alan must embark on a
full of magic and fantasy fighting monsters and demons to rid your village of
dark force. The game has a character dialogue system, an inventory for
item storage being: weapons and magic potions, advanced item system and a mechanic
easy to understand, in addition to the dialogues in Portuguese, English and Spanish, the controls are given through the keyboard and mouse,
having both normal and special moves, the camera is at a higher level giving the player a view of the
scenery that counts with graphic shaders of great quality.
2069350.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
